J=F8rn Wildt wrote:
>
> Can anybody help with some inspiration for a media =
type for case
> files, dossiers and documents? This is for a project where =

Sounds like a=
 hypertext application to me; nothing wrong with HTML,
with or without RDFa=
.  Instead of needing an application-specific
client, open-government data =
should be accessible by anyone with a Web
browser, IMO.

-Eric
